comment: Airbus A320. RT : passengers on board GermanWings plane which has crashed in French Alps, according to AFP
amr:
# ::snt Airbus A320. RT : passengers on board GermanWings plane which has crashed in French Alps, according to AFP
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (p / publication
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "AFP"))
            :ARG1 (p2 / passenger
                  :location (p3 / plane
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "GermanWings")
                        :ARG1-of (c / crash-01

                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Alps")
                                    :part-of (c2 / country
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "France")))))))

            :name (n5 / name
                  :op1 "Airbus"
                  :op2 "A320"))
      :snt3 (p5 / publication
            :name (n6 / name
                  :op1 "RT")))
